summary: Laurie and Hugh are a successful young couple who have just closed on a weekend home away from the city. When their friends explore the property, they have no idea that they disturbed an emotionally-broken killing machine: The Blood Widow.
cast: Danielle Lilley|Brandon Kyle Peters|Christopher de Padua|Jose Miguel Vasquez|Kelly Quinn|Emily Cutting|Phillip Marunowski|Gabrielle Ann Henry|W. Foster Dugas Jr.|Pamela Dugas|Derek Marunowski|Rachel Wilder Gore|Brittnie Dugas-Chaknis|Justin Chaknis|Francesca Marchado|Kyle Davis|Tiffany Dion|Jasmine Forsberg|Julie Gottfried|Ashley Perez|Gina Perez|Stacy Taylor|Akayla Van Dine|Asia Van Dine
title: Blood Widow
